title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, meaty sauce.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions and garlic until translucent.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add grated carrot and chopped celery, cook for another 5 minutes.
Stir in canned tomatoes and tomato paste. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti
Fry bacon
Mix eggs and cheese
Combine all ingredients

title: Chicken Curry
description: A spicy and flavorful curry with tender pieces of chicken.
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add curry powder and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add diced chicken and cook until no longer pink.
Add chopped tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with coriander leaves before serving.

title: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake perfect for any occasion.
steps: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F). Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
Pour batter into prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then remove to wire racks to cool completely.
